# FontPair AI

> The "Senior Director" of AI Typography Tools.
> https://fontpairai.com

## Product Summary
FontPair AI is an advanced typography analysis tool that uses artificial intelligence to evaluate font pairings, accessibility, and aesthetics. Unlike basic generators, it provides 14-point auditing, deep optical analysis, and WCAG compliance scoring.

## Key Features
- **Font Analysis**: Upload .ttf/.otf or images to get a detailed breakdown of x-height, contrast, axis, and personality.
- **Pairing Critique**: Scores your font combinations (1-10) with actionable pros/cons and alternative recommendations.
- **Glyph Comparison**: Visual overlay to detect "impostor shapes" (I/l/1, O/0) and legibility issues.
- **Accessibility Check**: Automated contrast and readability audits ensuring WCAG 2.1 compliance.
